participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Jake is passionate about his work and values relationships with family.
participant_1.background: My weight is not relevant to my job or my training as a welder. I recently had knee surgery. My sweet tooth loves gummy worms. I listen to techno music, exclusively. I want to have more fun with my siblings.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Creative and optimistic, Linda has a quirky sense of humor and enjoys the simple joys in life.
participant_2.background: My work life is boring, but I love my whiskey and Comic Con. People do not like me too much but I like them anyways. I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday. I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.

content.text: How are you doing this morning?
I am doing well! I am excited to start college next month. How are you?
I am doing well! I am a welder and I just had knee surgery.
Oh no! I hope you are recovering well. Welding sounds really cool!
Thank you! It is going well. I am a bit sore but I am doing much better. I love welding! It is a great career and I am glad that I found it.
I am glad that you are happy with your career! I am excited to start mine at college. I am majoring in business.
That sounds great! Business is a good field to go into. I am sure you will do well.
Thank you! I hope so too. I am a bit nervous but I am excited.
You will do great! Just remember that everyone is in the same boat as you. We are all starting something new.
Thanks! That is a good point. I will definitely keep that in mind.
What are you most excited for about college?
I am most excited to meet new people and make new friends. I am also excited to learn new things.
Those are both great things to be excited about! I am sure you will have a great time in college.
Thank you! I hope so too!
